messages.content: The more I look the worse it gets

This is gonna get worse before it gets better.
That is even worse. No tax from them and we provide them with services.
Ah yes, the poison. The worst part of any poisoning.
We’re used to crazy cold weather but this is much worse, a lot of people are just staying inside till Thursday.
I mean everyone already knows what u like so its gonna be weird
Even this tweet reeks just from the description provided (and the way her friends must look/smell). I’m gagging.

The questions are normal enough, but all at once and leading with them is a little weird.
My point was that it’s creepy. I never said it was illegal.
Oof, what a bad and dated meme
